effects: Physical damage (1x, ATK) to all enemies
Reduce resistance to Light by 50% for 2 turns to all enemies
Add Light element to physical attacks for 2 turn(s) to caster

Gain access to following skills for one turn:
	Fatal Barrage (505790)
	Last Shot (505780)
name: Light Assualt
Light Assualt
閃光攻擊
광선 공격
Assaut lumineux
Lichtangriff
Asalto luminoso
desc_short: Damage and reduce light resistance for all enemies, and add light element to own physical attack, and enable last shot and fatal barrage for one turn
攻擊全體敵人+降低光屬性耐性德的數值+將自身的物理攻擊賦予光屬性攻擊+1回合內可以使用「最後一射」「致命火力」
적 전체에 피해+빛속성 저항력 감소+사용자의 번개공격에 빛속성 부여+1턴 동안 '라스트 샷', '꽃잎 세례' 사용 가능
Dégâts, réduit la résistance à la lumière de tous les ennemis, ajoute l'élément de lumière à l'attaque physique du lanceur et active Dernier tir et Barrage fatal pendant un tour
Fügt allen Gegnern Schaden zu und reduziert ihre Lichtresistenz + fügt eigenem phys. Angriff Lichtelement hinzu. Ermöglicht eine Runde lang Letzter Schuss und Tödliches Sperrfeuer.
Daña y reduce la res. a la luz de todos los enemigos, añade elemento luz a los ataques físicos propios y aprende Disparo final y Ráfaga mortal durante un turno
